mapper.select: SELECT MNO,MID,MNAME,MNICK,MGENDER,MEMAIL,MGOALNUM FROM MEMBER WHERE MTYPE='N' AND MSTATUS='Y' ORDER BY MENROLLDATE
SELECT M.MID,M.MNAME,M.MPHONE,D.DRAPPLYDATE,D.DRVALUE,D.DRDONATEDATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN DONATERECEIPT D ON (M.MNO=D.DR_MNO) ORDER BY D.DRAPPLYDATE
SELECT M.MNO,M.MNICK,M.MNAME,M.MID,M.MGENDER,M.MPHONE,M.MEMAIL,M.MGOALNUM, (SELECT SUM(PVALUE) FROM POINT WHERE P_MNO=M.MNO ) AS PVALUE FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MNO=#{mno}

SELECT M.MID, M.MFUNDTYPE,DH.DHSTARTDATE,DH.DHSTATUS,DH.DHVALUE,MAX(DHD.DHDCOUNT) AS CNT,SUM(DH.DHVALUE) AS SUM FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH JOIN DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL DHD ON (DH.DHNO=DHD.DHD_DHNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(DH.DH_MNO_TAKE=M.MNO) WHERE DH.DH_MNO_GIVE =#{dh_Mno_give} GROUP BY M.MID, DH.DHNO, M.MFUNDTYPE, DH.DHSTARTDATE, DH.DHVALUE, DH.DHSTATUS ORDER BY DH.DHSTATUS DESC, DH.DHSTARTDATE DESC

SELECT M.MID, M.MFUNDTYPE,F.FTITLE,F.FSTARTDATE,F.FENDDATE,FH.FHVALUE,FH.FHDATE,F.FSTATUS FROM FUNDING F JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON(F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(F.FWRITER=M.MNO) WHERE FH.FH_MNO_GIVE=#{fh_Mno_Give} AND F.FTYPE='MONEY' ORDER BY FH.FHDATE DESC

SELECT M.MID, M.MFUNDTYPE,F.FTITLE,F.FSTARTDATE,F.FENDDATE,F.FSTATUS,FHD.FHDITEMVALUE,FI.INAME,FH.FHDATE FROM FUNDING F JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON(F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(F.FWRITER=M.MNO) JOIN FUNDHISTORYDETAIL FHD ON(FHD.FHD_FHNO=FH.FHNO) JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON (FI.INO=FHD.FHD_INO) WHERE FH.FH_MNO_GIVE=#{fh_Mno_Give} AND F.FTYPE='ITEM' ORDER BY FH.FHDATE DESC

SELECT M.MNO,M.MID,M.MNICK,M.MGENDER,M.MEMAIL,M.MFUNDTYPE,M.MNAME,M.MTAKESTATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A_MNO=M.MNO) WHERE M.MTYPE='H' AND M.MSTATUS='Y' AND M.MTAKESTATUS =1 AND A.ADATE IS NOT NULL AND M.MPRNEW IS NULL AND A.ADOCTYPE =1 AND M.MPRNEW IS NULL ORDER BY MACCEPTDATE DESC

SELECT MNO,MID,MNICK,MGENDER,MEMAIL,MFUNDTYPE,MNAME,MTAKESTATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MTYPE='H' AND MSTATUS='Y' AND MTAKESTATUS =3 AND MPR IS NOT NULL AND MACCEPTDATE IS NULL AND MACCEPTDATE IS NULL AND MPRACCEPTDATE IS NULL ORDER BY MENROLLDATE

SELECT M.MNO,M.MID,M.MNICK,M.MGENDER,M.MEMAIL,M.MFUNDTYPE,M.MNAME,M.MTAKESTATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A_MNO=M.MNO) WHERE M.MTYPE='H' AND M.MSTATUS='Y' AND A.ADATE IS NOT NULL AND M.MPR IS NOT NULL AND A.ADOCTYPE =1 AND M.MPRNEW IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MACCEPTDATE

SELECT M.MNO,M.MID,M.MNICK,M.MGENDER,M.MEMAIL,M.MFUNDTYPE,M.MNAME,M.MTAKESTATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A_MNO=M.MNO) WHERE M.MTYPE='H' AND M.MSTATUS='Y' AND (M.MTAKESTATUS=2 OR M.MTAKESTATUS=4) AND A.ADOCTYPE =2 AND A.ADATE IS NOT NULL AND A.ASTATUS='F' ORDER BY MACCEPTDATE

SELECT M.MNO,M.MID,M.MNICK,M.MGENDER,M.MEMAIL,M.MFUNDTYPE,M.MNAME,M.MTAKESTATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A_MNO=M.MNO) WHERE M.MTYPE='H' AND M.MSTATUS='Y' AND (M.MTAKESTATUS=2 OR M.MTAKESTATUS=4) AND A.ADOCTYPE =2 AND A.ADATE IS NULL AND A.ASTATUS='F' ORDER BY MACCEPTDATE

SELECT M.MID,DH.DHSTARTDATE,DH.DHSTATUS,DH.DHVALUE,MAX(DHD.DHDCOUNT) AS CNT,SUM(DH.DHVALUE) AS SUM FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH JOIN DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL DHD ON (DH.DHNO=DHD.DHD_DHNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(DH.DH_MNO_GIVE=M.MNO) WHERE DH.DH_MNO_TAKE =#{dh_Mno_take} GROUP BY M.MID, DH.DHNO, M.MFUNDTYPE, DH.DHSTARTDATE, DH.DHVALUE, DH.DHSTATUS ORDER BY DH.DHSTATUS DESC ,DH.DHSTARTDATE DESC

SELECT M.MID,F.FTITLE,F.FSTARTDATE,F.FENDDATE,FH.FHVALUE,F.FVALUETYPE,FH.FHDATE,F.FSTATUS FROM FUNDING F JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON(F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(FH.FH_MNO_GIVE=M.MNO) WHERE F.FWRITER=#{fWriter} AND F.FTYPE='MONEY' ORDER BY FH.FHDATE DESC

SELECT M.MID,F.FTITLE,F.FSTARTDATE,F.FENDDATE,F.FSTATUS,FHD.FHDITEMVALUE,FI.INAME,FH.FHDATE FROM FUNDING F JOIN FUNDHISTORY FH ON(F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(FH.FH_MNO_GIVE=M.MNO) JOIN FUNDHISTORYDETAIL FHD ON(FHD.FHD_FHNO=FH.FHNO) JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON (FI.INO=FHD.FHD_INO) WHERE F.FWRITER=#{fWriter} AND F.FTYPE='ITEM' ORDER BY FH.FHDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MTAKESTATUS=1, MACCEPTDATE=SYSDATE WHERE MNO=#{mno}
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ADATE=SYSDATE, ASTATUS='Y' WHERE A_MNO=#{a_mno} AND ADOCTYPE=1
UPDATE MEMBER SET MPR=NULL WHERE MNO=#{mno}
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ADATE=NULL, AORIGINNAME='EMPTY', ACHANGENAME='EMPTY' WHERE A_MNO=#{a_mno} AND ADOCTYPE=1
UPDATE MEMBER SET MPR=MPRNEW, MPRNEW=NULL, MPRACCEPTDATE=SYSDATE WHERE MNO=#{mno}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MPRNEW=NULL WHERE MNO=#{mno}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MTAKESTATUS=1 WHERE MNO=#{mno}
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ADATE=SYSDATE, ASTATUS='Y', AORIGINNAME=#{AttachName},ACHANGENAME=#{AttachName} WHERE A_MNO=#{a_mno} AND ADOCTYPE =1
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ADATE=NULL, ASTATUS='F', AORIGINNAME='EMPTY',ACHANGENAME='EMPTY' WHERE A_MNO=#{a_mno} AND ADOCTYPE =2
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ADATE=NULL, AORIGINNAME='EMPTY',ACHANGENAME='EMPTY',ASTATUS='F' WHERE A_MNO=#{a_mno} AND ADOCTYPE =2
mapper.select: SELECT F.FNO,F.FWRITER,F.FTITLE,F.FWRITEDATE,M.MID,M.MFUNDTYPE,F.FVALUETYPE,F.FVALUE FROM FUNDING F JOIN MEMBER M ON (F.FWRITER=M.MNO) WHERE F.FSTATUS='YET' AND F.FTYPE='MONEY' ORDER BY F.FWRITEDATE

SELECT DISTINCT F.FNO,F.FTITLE,F.FWRITER,F.FWRITEDATE,M.MID,M.MFUNDTYPE, (SELECT LISTAGG(CAST(FA2.INAME as varchar2(15)),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY FD_FNO) FROM FUNDINGDETAIL FA1 JOIN FUNDITEM FA2 ON(FA2.INO=FA1.FD_INO) WHERE F.FNO = FD_FNO GROUP BY FD_FNO) AS GOODSNAME ,(SELECT SUM(FDVALUE) FROM FUNDINGDETAIL WHERE FD_FNO=F.FNO) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM FUNDING F JOIN MEMBER M ON (F.FWRITER=M.MNO) JOIN FUNDINGDETAIL FD ON (F.FNO=FD.FD_FNO) JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON(FI.INO=FD.FD_INO) WHERE F.FSTATUS='YET' AND F.FTYPE='ITEM' ORDER BY F.FWRITEDATE

SELECT F.FNO,F.FTITLE,F.FWRITEDATE,F.FLEFTDAY,F.FCONTENT,FI.INAME,FD.FDVALUE FROM FUNDING F JOIN FUNDINGDETAIL FD ON (F.FNO=FD.FD_FNO) JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON(FI.INO=FD.FD_INO) WHERE F.FSTATUS='YET' AND F.FTYPE='ITEM' AND FNO=#{fNo}
SELECT Q.Q_MNO,Q.QNO,Q.QDATE,Q.QTITLE,Q.QANSWER,M.MID,M.MNAME,M.MNO FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO=Q.Q_MNO) WHERE QWRITER='H' ORDER BY Q.QANSWER NULLS FIRST,Q.QDATE DESC
SELECT Q.Q_MNO,Q.QNO,Q.QDATE,Q.QTITLE,Q.QANSWER,M.MID,M.MNAME,M.MNO FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO=Q.Q_MNO) WHERE QWRITER='N' ORDER BY Q.QDATE DESC,Q.QANSWER NULLS FIRST
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET QANSWER = #{qAnswer} WHERE QNO = #{qNo}
UPDATE QNA SET QANSWER=#{qAnswer} WHERE QNO=#{qNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R.RNO,M.MID,M.MNAME,R.RNAME,R.RDATE,R.RACCOUNT,R.RBANK,R.RVALUE,R.RSTATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN REFUND R ON (M.MNO=R.R_MNO) WHERE R.RSTATUS = #{rStatus} ORDER BY R.RDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE REFUND SET RSTATUS='Y' WHERE RNO=#{rNo}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(MENROLLDATE,'YYYYMM') AS month , COUNT(1) AS monthCnt FROM MEMBER WHERE MTYPE='N' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(MENROLLDATE,'YYYYMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(MENROLLDATE,'YYYYMM') DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MTYPE='N' AND MSTATUS='Y' AND TO_CHAR(MENROLLDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MTYPE='H' AND MSTATUS='Y' AND TO_CHAR(MACCEPTDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY WHERE TO_CHAR(DHSTARTDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING WHERE TO_CHAR(FSTARTDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT NVL(SUM(DHDVALUE),0) FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL WHERE TO_CHAR(DHDDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT NVL(SUM(FD.FDVALUE),0) FROM FUNDHISTORY FH JOIN FUNDINGDETAIL FD ON (FH.FH_FNO=FD.FD_FNO) WHERE TO_CHAR(FH.FHDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT NVL(SUM(FHVALUE),0) FROM FUNDHISTORY WHERE TO_CHAR(FHDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT NVL(SUM(PYPRICE),0) FROM PAYMENT WHERE TO_CHAR(PYDATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MTYPE='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MTYPE='H'
SELECT NVL(SUM(DHDVALUE),0) FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL
SELECT NVL(SUM(FHDITEMVALUE),0) FROM FUNDHISTORYDETAIL
SELECT NVL(SUM(FHVALUE),0) FROM FUNDHISTORY FH JOIN FUNDING F ON (F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) WHERE F.FTYPE ='MONEY'
SELECT NVL(SUM(FHVALUE),0) FROM FUNDHISTORY FH JOIN FUNDING F ON (F.FNO=FH.FH_FNO) WHERE F.FTYPE ='ITEM'
SELECT COUNT(DHNO) FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY
SELECT COUNT(FNO) FROM FUNDING
